channel.title: Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Siemens Healthineers MAGNETOM Sola fit NUMARIS/X VA20A
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Healthineers https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/en-us/support-documentation/cybersecurity/cve-2021-44228 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov LOG4J is used in the context of the help system. Workaround: close port 8090 for standalone systems. Setup IP whitelisting for “need to access” systems to network port 8090 in case a second console is connected. CISAGov Last Update: 12/22/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-22 15:25:51 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Healthineers X.Ceed Somaris 10 VA40*
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Healthineers https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/en-us/support-documentation/cybersecurity/cve-2021-44228 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Workaround: In the meantime, we recommend preventing access to port 8090 from other devices by configuration of the hospital network. CISAGov Last Update: 12/22/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-22 15:25:51 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens HES UDIS
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. Specific mitigation information has been released for the local project teams with the request of immediate deployment. A patch is planned for the next regular release. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Industrial Edge Management App (IEM-App)
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Exposure to vulnerability is limited as IEM-App runs in IEM-OS and IEM-OS is not intended to be exposed to public internet and should be operated in a protected environment. Please refer to the Industrial Edge - Security overview.

item.title: Siemens Industrial Edge Management Hub
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Vulnerability CVE-2021-44228 fixed on central cloud service starting 2021-12-13; no user actions necessary. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Industrial Edge Management OS (IEM-OS)
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Exposure to vulnerability is limited as IEM-OS is not intended to be exposed to public internet and should be operated in a protected environment. Please refer to the Industrial Edge - Security overview. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens LOGO! Soft Comfort
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Note: LOGO! Soft Comfort products were previously listed as affected. They were removed after closer investigation showed that they are not affected. CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable.
